1. A.I. Hallucinations Are Getting Worse, Even as New Systems Become More Powerful  The New York Times
  2. The AI Industry Has a Huge Problem: the Smarter Its AI Gets, the More It's Hallucinating  futurism.com
  3. ChatGPT's hallucination problem is getting worse according to OpenAI's own tests and nobody understands why  PC Gamer
  4. AI hallucination spooks law firms, halts adoption  Mint
  5. AI models routinely lie when honesty conflicts with their goals  theregister.com
